item.description:
SPONSORED BY RELIV http://www.relivingmaine.com/

Looking for nutrition products check out http://tonymyatt.myvi.net/

When: Sunday April 28, 2013 at 9:30AM

Where: Jimmy the Greeks 15 Philbrook Ave South Portland, Maine 04106

Proceeds benefit: "Lyme Buddies" an organization that provides hope, support, advocacy and holds events to raise awareness about Lyme Disease (www.lymebuddies.com).

Cost: $18 Pre-Registered $20 Race Day

Runner Amenities:

All registrants by Tuesday April 16th are guaranteed a t-shirt.

All runners may partake in a FREE Pizza Buffet following the race with beverage specials (ID required for alcoholic beverages). Family members may join for $5 each.

Awards: Top 3 Overall Male and Female, Top 2 in the following age categories male and female: 19 and under, 20-29, 30-39, 40-49, 50-59, 60-69, 70-79, 80+

Packet Pickup: Saturday April 27th from 5:30PM to 9PM at Jimmy the Greeks in South Portland. All registered runners receive 20% off their orders.

RACE DAY PACKET PICKUP & REGISTRATION for $20 begins at 7AM.

Directions:

Use 15 Philbrook Ave South Portland, ME in GPS or Garmins.

From South: Take Interstate 95, take exit 45 Maine Mall Rd/ME Route114. Go 0.4 miles on connector and take the Maine Mall Rd Exit toward Jetport/ME Route 114. Turn right onto Maine Mall Rd and at your third set of lights turn right onto Philbrook Ave. Registration 0.3 miles on your left.

From North (Lewiston/Auburn): Take I-95 to exit 45 Maine Mall Rd/ME Rt 114. Go 0.4 miles on connector and take the Maine Mall Rd Exit toward Jetport/ME Route 114. Turn right onto Maine Mall Rd and at your third set of lights turn right onto Philbrook Ave. Registration 0.3 miles on your left.

From North (Augusta/Gardiner) Take I-95 to I-295. Take Exit 1 Maine Mall Rd and stay in the right lane to the Maine Mall Rd Exit, bear right and at the stop sign go straight and immediately left. Registration in front of you.

Download a race course map here!
item.name: Maine Mall Run For Lyme Disease 5K, Portland, ME
